sentences.sContent: Honda won fame in the 1980s as the little car company that humbled the industry giants.
sentences.sCn: 20世纪80年代，本田作为一家小型汽车公司因一举击垮行业巨头而声名鹊起。

trans.tranCn: 谦逊的；简陋的；（级别或地位）低下的；不大的
trans.tranOther: not considering yourself or your ideas to be as important as other people’s

trans.tranCn: 使谦恭；轻松打败（尤指强大的对手）；低声下气
trans.tranOther: If you humble someone who is more important or powerful than you, you defeat them easily
